snippet.title: The Treasures of Montezuma (2007, PC) - Level 1 & 2 [720p]
snippet.description:
So I was introduced to this Bejeweled-like match-3 game in a forum I frequent. Just so I wanted to give it a try.

Still trying to understand the game mechanics of this - especially with the Score-Frenzy as well as the speed chain.

Too bad though this game have a mouse detection ability similar to Bejeweled 1 - making continued speed chaining difficult. ugh.

But most part though, certain parts of the game gets pretty intense, especially if you get a lot of hypercube-like runes on the board and trigger them near simultaneously/in a cascade

Enjoy!

(This is the 2009 "My Play City" version - although this was first released in 2007)

1-1 00:42
1-2 02:02
1-3 03:50
1-4 05:27
1-5 08:50
1-B 10:49

2-1 13:03
2-2 15:54
2-3 20:06
2-4 23:14
2-5 26:54
2-6 32:20 (60 speed chain)
2-B 37:37
————————————————————————————
— Casual Difficulty —
Part 01 — You are here
Part 02 — http://youtu.be/F6UZJf01zcc
Part 03 — http://youtu.be/iyU-G-l4Om0
Part 04 — http://youtu.be/symBmFuZgPQ
Part 05 — http://youtu.be/7pN2VvXUgmU

— Expert Difficulty —
Part 06 — http://youtu.be/xIBxcTdHTmM
Part 07 — http://youtu.be/ZsAAUBLGMUc
Part 08 — http://youtu.be/_Y-D7-QOy2I
Part 09 — http://youtu.be/KEhbZwws0RI
Part 10 — http://youtu.be/UfQ8Sb5mOUo
————————————————————————————
See my other gameplays of Treasures of Montezuma series here
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLnK-0g_LLzdxv2CdltvG8ovI-kslXjfIa
